snippet.title: Cash Cow DX - arcade game - launch trailer
snippet.description:
Get ready for a blast from the past with #CashCowDX – an 80s inspired arcade experience releasing 40 years late, on February 16th! 

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2225830/Cash_Cow_DX/
GOG: https://www.gog.com/en/game/cash_cow_dx
Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/cash-cow-dx-switch/

Holy cow, it's all about the moooney!

Embark on an udderly moo-velous adventure to rescue Cash Cow's riches from the grasp of those sneaky Pig Pockets and reclaim what's rightfully hers! Get ready for a blast from the past with an 80s inspired arcade experience released 40 years late...

It's no bull - this game is a challenge!
Think you're pasture prime for the task?

Cash Cow DX features…

- 5 multi-screen levels, bonus stages and secrets
- player speed selection: normal or turbo
- arcade, speedrun and marathon modes
- single stage practice
- worldwide leaderboards
- delightful chiptunes by Vincent Verger aka Tuï
- illustration by Pete Ellison

Tough as nails and no continues, but you can play until the cows come home! :)

Press kit: pixel.games
Official merch: peteellison.com

#Steam #AtariVCS #NintendoSwitch #iiRcade #HomeArcade
